name: confmandb
short_description: ConfManDB (CMDB) is a web based Configuration Management (CM) Database (DB) system designed to ease the automation of Linux system installation and configuration. The first OS supported by CMDB is CentOS 6.x. However CMDB has been coded to be as OS agnostic as possible. Support for other Linux distributions, OS X and possibly Windows maybe available in the future. CMDB is open source (under GPL v3) and leverages many other open source systems. CMDB scripts are written mostly in PHP and BASH. CMDB integrates the following software systems:  Apache,MySQL, Subversion, Trac, Kickstart, Puppet, YUM, Squid   CMDB was previously named LINF (Linux INFrastructure Management System) from 2007, but was renamed and released as ConfManDB in 2012.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)
